component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

project.component: { "keyToString": { "DefaultHtmlFileTemplate": "HTML File", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Download Shared Index": "Shared indexes available", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Language Plugins Notifications": "Recommended language plugin available", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Download Shared Index": "true", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Language Plugins Notifications": "true", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "WebServerToolWindowFactoryState": "false", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/cp_prj/prj/settings.py", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.jetbrains.python.configuration.PyActiveSdkModuleConfigurable" } }
